C I R S 

R

RomanNumeral - Interface in com.oracle.commons.utils
This interface defines methods to convert a regular, decimal number into a Roman numeral, and another method that converts a Roman numeral to a decimal number.
RomanNumeralConvertor - Class in com.oracle.commons.utils.convertor
RomanNumeral implementation that handles conversion to and from Roman/Decimal.
RomanNumeralConvertor() - Constructor for class com.oracle.commons.utils.convertor.RomanNumeralConvertor
